name: person
description: A human being, typically walking, running, or standing.

name: bicycle
description: A two-wheeled vehicle that is powered by pedaling.

name: car
description: A four-wheeled motor vehicle used for transportation.

name: motorcycle
description: A two-wheeled motor vehicle that is faster than a bicycle.

name: airplane
description: A powered flying vehicle with fixed wings.

name: bus
description: A large motor vehicle carrying passengers.

name: train
description: A connected series of railway cars moving on tracks.

name: truck
description: A large motor vehicle designed for transporting goods.

name: boat
description: A watercraft of various sizes used for transportation on water.

name: traffic light
description: A signaling device at road intersections controlling traffic flow.

name: fire hydrant
description: A water source for firefighters in case of emergency.

name: stop sign
description: A road sign indicating vehicles must stop before proceeding.

name: parking meter
description: A device that collects fees for vehicle parking.

name: bench
description: A long seat for multiple people, usually found in public places.

name: bird
description: A warm-blooded vertebrate animal with feathers and wings.

name: cat
description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur.

name: dog
description: A domesticated carnivorous mammal known for loyalty and companionship.

name: horse
description: A large domesticated animal used for riding and work.

name: sheep
description: A domesticated ruminant animal known for its woolly coat.

name: cow
description: A large domesticated animal raised for milk and meat.

name: elephant
description: A large land mammal with a trunk, native to Africa and Asia.

name: bear
description: A large, heavy mammal with thick fur, found in forests and mountains.

name: zebra
description: An African wild horse with distinctive black-and-white stripes.

name: giraffe
description: A tall African mammal with a very long neck and spotted coat.

name: backpack
description: A bag worn on the back to carry items.

name: umbrella
description: A device used to protect against rain or sun.

name: handbag
description: A small bag carried by hand for personal items.

name: tie
description: A neck accessory worn with formal shirts.

name: suitcase
description: A portable container for carrying clothes and personal items.

name: frisbee
description: A lightweight disc thrown and caught in a game.

name: skis
description: Narrow strips attached to boots for gliding over snow.

name: snowboard
description: A flat board used for gliding down snowy slopes.

name: sports ball
description: A spherical object used in various sports.

name: kite
description: A lightweight frame covered with material flown in the wind.

name: baseball bat
description: A wooden or metal bat used to hit a baseball.

name: baseball glove
description: A padded leather glove used for catching baseballs.

name: skateboard
description: A board mounted on wheels used for skating.

name: surfboard
description: A long board used to ride on ocean waves.

name: tennis racket
description: A racket used to hit a tennis ball.

name: bottle
description: A container for holding liquids.

name: wine glass
description: A stemmed glass designed for drinking wine.

name: cup
description: A small open container for drinking liquids.

name: fork
description: A utensil with prongs for eating food.

name: knife
description: A tool with a blade used for cutting.

name: spoon
description: A utensil with a round bowl for scooping food.

name: bowl
description: A round deep dish used for holding food or liquid.

name: banana
description: A long curved fruit with a yellow peel.

name: apple
description: A round fruit with red, green, or yellow skin.

name: sandwich
description: Two slices of bread with filling in between.

name: orange
description: A citrus fruit with a tough bright orange skin.

name: broccoli
description: A green vegetable with a tree-like structure.

name: carrot
description: An orange root vegetable often used in salads.

name: hot dog
description: A cooked sausage served in a sliced bun.

name: pizza
description: A baked dish with toppings on a dough base.

name: donut
description: A fried dough confection, typically ring-shaped.

name: cake
description: A sweet baked dessert, often with frosting.

name: chair
description: A piece of furniture for sitting, typically with a back.

name: couch
description: A long upholstered seat with a back and arms.

name: potted plant
description: A plant grown in a container, usually for decoration.

name: bed
description: Furniture for sleeping, usually a mattress on a frame.

name: dining table
description: A table used for serving and eating meals.

name: toilet
description: A plumbing fixture for human waste disposal.

name: tv
description: An electronic device for viewing video content.

name: laptop
description: A portable personal computer.

name: mouse
description: A pointing device used with computers.

name: remote
description: A handheld device for controlling electronics wirelessly.

name: keyboard
description: A panel of keys used to input text and commands.

name: cell phone
description: A portable telephone that connects via cellular network.

name: microwave
description: An appliance that heats food using microwave radiation.

name: oven
description: An appliance used for baking or roasting food.

name: toaster
description: An appliance that browns slices of bread.

name: sink
description: A bowl with a faucet for washing hands or dishes.

name: refrigerator
description: An appliance that keeps food and drinks cold.

name: book
description: A set of printed pages bound together containing information.

name: clock
description: A device for measuring and displaying time.

name: vase
description: A container used for holding flowers or decoration.

name: scissors
description: A cutting instrument with two blades joined together.

name: teddy bear
description: A soft stuffed toy bear often used as a comforting companion for children.

name: hair drier
description: An electric device that blows hot air to dry and style hair after washing.

name: toothbrush
description: A small brush with a handle, used for cleaning teeth and maintaining oral hygiene.
